cause.description:
The mission is to raise the awareness of the abuse of animals to a global level, to eradicate the euthanasia of healthy and adoptable companion animals and to mount efforts to enhance animal welfare throughout the world.
Please visit the following petition: New C-373 Petition for..http://www.queenwaldorf.com/ to introduce government legislation amending the Criminal Code provisions on animal cruelty based on Bill C-373 and to recommend against Bill S-213.
Please see Amendments at a glance here and compare Bill differences! http://cfhs.ca/law/differences_between_current_...
